title: Data Engineer - Principal/Lead / Data Tech Lead / Head of Data Engineering
description:
Aventis is delighted to be working with a leading tech firm looking to advance their new strategy for AI-driven transformation. We are seeking a couple of experienced Data Engineers - Principal or Lead level / Data Tech Lead / Head of Data Engineering to join their newly created AI Innovation Team and play a pivotal role in delivering cutting-edge AI solutions internally.

This is a fantastic opportunity for a technically skilled and innovative professional to create AI systems that drive real business value and make a tangible impact.

Key Details:

Location: Remote-based with Chicago HQ + London hub (annual trip). Plus satellite offices in Austin, Texas and New York

Salary: $130,000-$180,000 + bonus + strong benefits package

Key Skills, Attributes, and Technologies Desired:
• AI Interest: Knowledge and underlying interest in data science / AI, with a strong technical knowledge in machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and generative AI.
• Data Platforms: Hands-on experience with modern data platforms like Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery, or similar.
• Programming Proficiency: Advanced skills in SQL and/or Python.
• Data Pipelines: Proven ability to build, optimise, and scale ETL/ELT pipelines using tools like Apache Spark, Airflow, or dbt.
• CI/CD & DevOps: As above with a focus on Azure DevOps, or experience with GitLab or GitHub Actions or similar
• Data Mastery: Expertise in big data tools and experience with data engineering for AI applications.
• Leadership Excellence: Proven ability to lead multidisciplinary teams, inspire innovation, and foster cross-functional collaboration.
• Data as a Product: Commercial experience internally or externally would be useful
• Visionary Approach: A passion for innovation and a keen interest in emerging fields like generative AI, reinforcement learning, and autonomous systems.
• Industry Knowledge: Experience in industries such as finance, healthcare, e-commerce, or enterprise solutions, with an understanding of how AI drives transformation in these spaces.

Role Overview:

This role places you at the helm of a fast-growing organisation dedicated to leveraging AI to solve complex challenges and create lasting impact. You will play a critical role in shaping the company’s data technology strategy, delivering innovative solutions, and laying the foundations for future growth in AI and MLOps.

Interested? Please apply with your CV and/or email Billy Hall for further details.

Aventis Solutions is working on behalf of our partner.
